verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: followed] [ARG1: the presidential tradition of referring to Black History Month as National African American History Month in his official proclamation] .

[ARG0: President Donald Trump] followed the presidential tradition of [V: referring] [ARG1: to Black History Month] [ARG2: as National African American History Month] [ARGM-LOC: in his official proclamation] .
